Мастер фраза для определения максимально: Well, that old thing almost tore me to pieces for its g
dialogs_chapter_11_Там же. В северо-запа: There. In the northwestern region of Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_11_Я пришла, как только: I came as soon as I dealt with the remnants of the Risen.
Dead. Claudius disappeared. Folter\..\..\.. absorbed Adamant's energy
and left, according to Irey.
Does that mean\..\..\.. It's over? Everything is over?
dialogs_chapter_11_Ха. Ха-ха! Хоть ненад: Ha. Ha-ha! At least I can breathe a sigh of relief for a little while.
dialogs_chapter_11_С ума сойти\\..\\..\\:
It's crazy\..\..\.. Just yesterday I was preparing reports for 
the lady, gathering the council of the Werolomgers, we were 
discussing problems, restoring Purgatory from the first war of 
Adamant\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_11_А сейчас ты лежишь у:
And now you are lying on my lap half-dead, around
the bodies of the Risen, the reapers\..\..\.. And again we 
almost lost everything.
dialogs_chapter_11_Я думал ты привыкла к: I thought you were used to this.
dialogs_chapter_11_Видимо привыкла, но н: Apparently I was used to it, but I wasn't ready.
And you yourself\..\..\.. Recently you slept during Irey's 
lectures, and now, all alone, you have become the terror 
of the armies of the Risens and the Devastators.
dialogs_chapter_11_Прости, мама, увлекся: Sorry, Mom, I got carried away.
dialogs_chapter_11_Если честно, я на гра:
To be honest, I'm on the edge. Genom Morkret 
turned out to have a double bottom\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_11_Это парные мечи. Внут:
These are twin swords. Inside the illusory world of 
Koeltan, I met Darkus Morde, the true face of Koeltan.
dialogs_chapter_11_Это чудовище чуть не:
That monster almost broke me in every sense, but 
I was stronger, brought him to his knees and forced 
him to submit.
dialogs_chapter_11_Меня разрывают эмоции:
I am torn with emotion, after all that I have been 
through, all that I have learned.
dialogs_chapter_11_Война с Восставшими э:
The war with the Risen is a distraction. For whom?
The Nightmare's words about the Second Cataclysm
coming. This is a real problem. We should have been
prepared for it.
And in the end\..\..\.. We were cleaning up old problems.
The war with the devastators, which began because of one
bloodthirsty idiot.
dialogs_chapter_11_Война с прислужниками:
The war with the servants of Adamant, which began because
of the mistake of the first reaper Pelagius. If he had chosen 
a more suitable place for Purgatory\..\..\.. The catastrophe 
could have been avoided.
dialogs_chapter_11_Мы не можем знать нав:
We can't know for sure what will happen. If we think like that, 
then it's better to do nothing at all, then there are no 
consequences.
dialogs_chapter_11_Рикард с Пелагием не:
Ricard and Pelagius are not saints. They have done a lot of 
things, both good and bad. And we are forced to pay for
their mistakes.
dialogs_chapter_11_Главное, Риом, что зд:
The main thing, Riom, is that here and now it ended, 
and a new page in our history has begun.
dialogs_chapter_11_Ты быстро вырос. Я по:
You grew up quickly. I remember how I always called you
young reaper or “little one”. Hee-hee\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_11_Сейчас ты тот, с кем:
Now you are the one with whom I am ready to spend 
eternity until the Second Cataclysm. And it is also 
unlikely that anyone will dare to call you a "young reaper", 
the one who will soon become a Werolomger.
dialogs_chapter_11_Я люблю тебя, таким к: I love you just the way you are.
dialogs_chapter_11_Лаурита достает слито: Laurita takes out a healing ingot.
dialogs_chapter_11_Где я?! Что происходи: Where am I?! What's going on?!
dialogs_chapter_11_Ты\\..\\..\\.. Давно: You\..\..\.. I haven't heard from you in a long time.
dialogs_chapter_11_Почему ты не отвечал,: Why didn't you answer when I asked for help?
dialogs_chapter_11_Пожалуй, пора тебе уз:
Perhaps it's time for you to know the truth. Why do 
you think I chose you? There were many worthy 
candidates, but they were missing something.
dialogs_chapter_11_Да\\..\\..\\.. Жнецы: Yes\..\..\.. Reapers are a bit like humans.
dialogs_chapter_11_Но ты жнец с человече:
But you are a reaper with a human heart and soul. A special
delicacy.
dialogs_chapter_11_Хе-хе\\..\\..\\.. В п:
He-he\..\..\.. Literally. The real reason for the death of all my
owners is him. I helped you only for this moment.
dialogs_chapter_11_Все погибали, когда у: Everyone died when they found out my true face.
dialogs_chapter_11_Что\\..\\..\\.. тебе:
What\..\..\.. do you want?! Who are you talking about?! Who
is\..\..\.. “he”?
dialogs_chapter_11_Поздно пытаться добра: It's too late to try to get to the truth, Riom.
dialogs_chapter_11_Но одно скажу. Мне ну:
But I will say one thing. I need your body. I will take it under 
my control, you will disappear as a person and I will cease 
to be a spirit, the embodiment of bloodlust.
dialogs_chapter_11_И да\\..\\..\\.. твои:
And yes\..\..\.. with your hands, I will kill everyone who gets in 
my way.
dialogs_chapter_11_А после встречусь со:
And then I will meet my brothers from the Abyss, they have 
been waiting for me.
dialogs_chapter_11_Тварь. Предатель. Что: Creature. Traitor. I hope you die, you bastard!
Riom, do you\..\..\.. recognize me? Remember who you are?
dialogs_chapter_11_Я не хочу тебя убиват:
I don't want to kill you\..\..\.. don't make me resort to
extreme measures!
dialogs_chapter_11_(Ты не оставил мне вы:
(You left me no choice\..\..\.. Such a powerful aura\..\..\.. 
Like during the release form. So this is how you look in all 
your glory, Genom Morkret.)
dialogs_chapter_11_Как скажешь. Форма вы:
As you say. Release form. Schwert von Odin, Snow 
Queen.
dialogs_chapter_11_Придется охладить тво: I'll have to cool your ardor. Executioner Darkus Morde.
dialogs_chapter_11_Риом чувствует касани: Riom feels the touch of healing energy.
dialogs_chapter_11_Не напрягайся, а то с: Don't strain yourself, or you'll bleed out again.
dialogs_chapter_11_Всё закончилось?\\..\: Is it all over?\..\.. How are the others?
dialogs_chapter_11_Да, мы победили. Восс:
Yes, we have won. The Risens have been destroyed and 
no longer pose a threat to Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_11_Хорошо\\..\\..\\.. Че: Okay\..\..\.. Why are you so sad?
Guess\..\..\.. I went up to the roof and saw you in a pool of
blood! And when I used the life ingot, you were still lying 
there, lifeless.
dialogs_chapter_11_Ты столько ран получи:
You received so many wounds, no reaper would have 
survived after such a thing.
Sorry, I couldn't help myself. Krieger didn't want to die at all,
so I had to hit him with the rest of my spiritual energy, and it
was holding back the bleeding\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_11_Неважно. Главное, что: It doesn't matter. The main thing is that you survived.
dialogs_chapter_11_Рита положила руку на: Rita put her hand on Riom's hair.
dialogs_chapter_11_Не боишься руку в кро: Aren't you afraid of getting your hand bloody?
dialogs_chapter_11_Не особо. На волосах:
Not really. It's been dried and stuck to my hair for a long 
time now\..\..\.. Do you like teasing me?
dialogs_chapter_11_Ха-ха\\..\\..\\.. Ага: Ha-ha\..\..\.. Yeah, the temptation is just too strong.
dialogs_chapter_11_Я думаю, через пару д:
I think in a couple of days Purgatory will be restored, 
and we'll either return to the routine or be drawn back 
into the cycle of events.
dialogs_chapter_11_А ещё думаю, какая же: And I also think how cute you are, Rita.
dialogs_chapter_11_Когда я полностью вос:
When I'm fully recovered, shall we secretly go to the 
world of the Living?
dialogs_chapter_11_Подальше от глаз жнец: Away from the eyes of the reapers. This is a small surprise.
dialogs_chapter_11_Риом потерял сознание: Riom passed out with a smile on his face.
dialogs_chapter_11_Как так получилось? Ч: How did this happen? What did I miss?
dialogs_chapter_11_Риом не проявлял ника: Riom showed no signs of possession. He acted as usual.
dialogs_chapter_11_Рита нащупывает набор: Rita fumbles for a set of stun ingots.
dialogs_chapter_11_Неважно! Народ, приго:
Never mind! People, get ready, Riom is not himself. 
From what I saw, he is controlled by Genom Morkret.
dialogs_chapter_11_Едрить меня за душу\\: Fuck me\..\..\.. This is the last thing I need.
dialogs_chapter_11_Как его вернуть в нор: How do I get him back to normal?
dialogs_chapter_11_Известен только один:
There's only one way - beat him to the point where he 
falls down exhausted.
dialogs_chapter_11_Главное только не пер: The main thing is not to overdo it.
dialogs_chapter_11_А разве нет очищающег: Isn't there a cleansing ritual or something like that?
dialogs_chapter_11_Если бы и был, его пр:
Even if there was, it wouldn't be any easier to pull off. 
Try to make the possessed one stand still for a while\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_11_Дело в другом. Я не х: It's different. I don't want to hurt him.
dialogs_chapter_11_Придется. Он та нам е: We'll have to. He really wants to smash our faces.
dialogs_chapter_11_Прости Риом\\..\\..\\: Forgive me, Riom\..\..\.. Be a little bit patient, we'll definitely save you!
With one foot in the grave. And you almost sent us there.
dialogs_chapter_11_Все позади. Тебя нена:
It's all over. You were briefly taken over by your own sword, 
and we miraculously managed to bring you back.
dialogs_chapter_11_Рано радуетесь. Риом,:
It's too early to rejoice. Riom, is your ghostly "friend" no longer 
trying to get out? To get some fresh air\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_11_Роза\\..\\..\\.. Нет,: Rose\..\..\.. No, I can't feel his presence anymore.
dialogs_chapter_11_Я кого-то убил пока,: Did I kill someone while I was out of my mind?
dialogs_chapter_11_Прости. Коельтан заст:
Sorry. Koeltan caught me by surprise. First he transferred 
me to his world, then he let me go. As it seemed to me, he 
simply decided to say goodbye.
dialogs_chapter_11_Оказалось, что он жда:
It turned out that he was waiting for me to run out of steam 
and my mind to completely crumble.
dialogs_chapter_11_Не повезло тебе с сос:
You're unlucky with your neighbor. You'll have to put up 
with him for the rest of your life. Think about how to calm 
him down in your spare time, so that such situations never 
happen again.
dialogs_chapter_11_Ладно, чую мы тут лиш:
Okay, I sense we're too much here. Rose, Ken, let's go help
the others.
dialogs_chapter_11_Сильно напугал?: Did you scare us too much?
dialogs_chapter_11_Как там с Восставшими: How are things with the Risen? Is there anyone left?
dialogs_chapter_11_Мы победили. Сейчас ж:
We won. Now the reapers and the Werolomgers are helping 
the wounded.
dialogs_chapter_11_Свидание в мире людей: A date in the human world.
dialogs_chapter_11_Да. Теперь такая возм: Yes. Now there is such an opportunity.
dialogs_chapter_11_Ты не против, если я: Do you mind if I sleep a little?\..\..
dialogs_chapter_11_Рита положила руку на: Rita put her hand on Riom's forehead and closed his eyes.
dialogs_chapter_11_Отец\\..\\..\\.. Во в: Father\..\..\.. You arrived just in time\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_11_Риом, держись. Не ухо: Riom, hold on. Don't go into the Abyss. Now\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_11_Нет-нет! Не подходи к: No, no! Don't come near me!
dialogs_chapter_11_Или точнее, одержимый: Or rather, possessed beast. Do you have a name?
dialogs_chapter_11_(Я не повторю ту же о: (I won't make the same mistake as Claudius.)
dialogs_chapter_11_(Одержимость лечится:
(There is only one way to cure obsession - you need to 
defeat the Risenlious spirit so that the owner of the 
sword survives.)
dialogs_chapter_11_Прости сын, твой приз: Sorry son, your ghostly friend left me no choice.
dialogs_chapter_11_Сидрин приложил гисти: Sidrin placed the histite sword on his left shoulder.
dialogs_chapter_11_После удара Сидрина к:
After Sidrin's strike, the bones of the possessed Rioma 
were turned inside out, almost no insides were left.
dialogs_chapter_11_Укусом Даркус вогнал: Darkus bit and drove streams of darkness into Sidrin's body.
dialogs_chapter_11_Из тела Сидрина во вс: Slicing darkness came out of Sidrin's body in all directions.
